name: Springhill Suites Marriott West Palm Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were travelling between Orlando and Miami and stopped at this place enroute (Oct 2012) as it was close to I-95.
reviews.title: Great place to stop the night

reviews.text: Arriving at about 9pm we were greeted by the friendly front desk staff, quickly checked in and pointed to our room. They also pointed out a few local restuarants and bars if we wanted.
reviews.title: This place is awesome

reviews.text: The room was large, well equipt and ideal - we had plenty of space to unwind, cook dinner and relax without falling over our stuff. Breakfast the following morning was very good - large selection for you to help yourself too (although a slightly odd mix of people as it looked like a few police and doctors from the nearby medical centre had all stopped in for breakfast as well!)
reviews.title: A Perfect Place To Stay

reviews.text: Was incredible value for money and would stay again.
reviews.title: Excellent Stop

reviews.text: Wow, clean modern rooms, nice coffee service in lobby. It was very close to i-95. I was totally happy and satisfied with my stay. if you do not have a rental car this could be an issue as there was no hotel bar or restaurant. They did have a very nice continental breakfast and sold snacks by front desk.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.text: New hotel with clean facilities and nice staff. Suites maximize the square footage in the hotel so that it feels larger than it actually measures. Rooms are quiet and breakfast is decent given that it is included in the rate.
reviews.title: Great Marriott Property

reviews.text: Customer service- friendly staff. Breakfast was great. Price was right.
reviews.title: Good Value

reviews.text: The only dislike was the dirty bedskirts, I don't like playing name that stain when it comes to anything on a hotel bed. The furniture was drab and stained aswell.
reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!

reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised at the cleanliness and state of this hotel. All the staff was so nice and helpful. Will definitely put Springhill Suites on the top of my list of places to stay in the future. Complimentary breakfast was good. We stayed for 5 nights and the only complaint I can think of is that local doctors came in and were eating for "free" at the breakfast buffet...which was very annoying to myself a paying guest.
reviews.title: Decent Hotel but They Can't Handle a Busy Check-In

reviews.text: We came in on Saturday for the Dave Matthews Band concert. Arrived at 2:45 and attempted to check in and the lady, Jessica, who was manning the desk informed us that check-in is at 3PM and the only room they had available was a handicapped room on the first floor. So we waited for the 15 minutes to get a room we reserved. There were about 4 other couples waiting in the lobby to check in with the same situation. 3PM came and there was a rush of everyone checking in, there was a different person at the desk at that time and was polite but quiet. He assigned me a room on the first floor and it was no big deal, but low and behold the room was the handicapped room. I wouldn't mind it minus the shower. I figured since I used a free night certificate they stuck us in that room because I was not a paying customer. I just wish they had given us the room in the first place had I known that it was going to be the same room as proposed 15 minutes earlier. Since we were there for only one night I didn't bother saying anything to the manager as we got back from the concert at 1:30 in the morning. The breakfast was okay but nothing to write home about. Next time I am in the area I would probably book the Residence Inn next door.
reviews.title: Would go back again now if I could!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: From the moment you walk into the door of this property you are warmly welcomed by the staff and you are continually made to feel "at home." The property is immaculate and the rooms are so perfect! We'll go back, for sure!
reviews.title: Perfect in every way!

reviews.text: I arrived at West Palm for a one night retreat since I considered Palm Beach County my home county. I loved the room on the third floor with a nice view, especially since I saw the sunset there. The fitness room has free weight/dbells and there are one stationary bike plus rwo threadmill "excatly what I needed" since I do both cardio on my daily basis. The pool looked nice but I didn't use it due to lack of time. The breakfast was great.
reviews.title: The services was great, no issues what so ever.

reviews.text: The front desk is very friendly especially the young, I believe Haitian, who greeted me friendly and engaged in a conversation about my long facial hair "beard".
reviews.title: Super hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bottom line: I will continue to visit this hotel, perhaps for Sunfest in wpb.
reviews.title: staff at front desk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks for the services!
reviews.title: Good rates, helpful staff

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel in May, along with two other adults. I was visiting for a religious convention in the area. The location was just 5 min away from my destination. The hotel was modern and the front desk was very friendly. The room was clean and we had a wonderful view of the very large pool. They had decent breakfast options which were included in our stay. There was a kitchenette which worked out perfectly for lunch prep. I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Just right...

reviews.text: What you would expect from SpringHill Suites. The staff is very courteous and the breakfast is mildly decent.
reviews.title: Great value, great rooms.
Perfect home away from home
reviews.text: Value is great.
Some complaints that the bathroom sink doesn't have privacy behind a door, but that doesn't bother me at all.
reviews.title: Decent hotel.

reviews.text: This was the best customer service I have ever received. I have stayed at 5 star hotels and the service at Spring Hill far exceeds any service I have ever received. The manager Joe along with his staff l encountered truly made me feel at home. I was greeted by my name every time I entered the hotel. The hotel was very very clean, inside and outside. Nice pool area. Great breakfast. I would like the thank the following employees for making my stay pleasant. Keisha,Joe,Christian,Kelvin,Kearn and Chad.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Meeting Room

aka: Springhill Suites Marriott West Palm Beach Hotel West Palm Beach
description: SpringHill Suites West Palm Beach is located just off I-95, 8 miles from Palm Beach International Airport in Metrocentre Business Park. Our all suite hotel provides guests all the comforts of home with separate sleeping, sitting, pantry areas and a 42in LG flat screen TV. Start your day with our complimentary Suite Seasons Breakfast buffet and shop City Place, Palm Beach Gardens Mall, and Gander Mountain all nearby our West Palm Beach hotel.
